pages.text: The $(item)Ender Ocular$() is, to put it simply, a handheld version of the $(l:using/ender_crate)Ender Crate$(). After giving it an $(thing)Ender Name$() the exact same way, interacting with it while holding it in one's hand will open the storage then and there. For this, an $(l:items/aura_cache)Aura Cache$() is required that some $(aura) will be drained from.
